summary:
I lead the strategic oversight and optimisation of sales and marketing technology ecosystems at Certinia. My focus is operationalising go-to-market systems that combine data, process, and people to scale revenue impact.

I manage complex technical stacks from end to end, optimising workflows for every sales role to eliminate administrative friction. I’m particularly passionate about AI and automation, identifying and implementing machine learning solutions that automate repetitive tasks, improve forecast accuracy, and create tangible business impact through cross-platform workflows.

I refine reporting, improve opportunity conversion rates and territory coverage, and implement automation that maximises coverage and efficiency, with hands-on experience in Salesforce-native workflows, Outreach, 6sense, and AI-assisted prospecting.

I design and refine lead-to-opportunity processes whilst standardising workflows across Field Sales Ops, Marketing Ops, and Sales Leadership to ensure organisational alignment.

I believe the right technology, properly implemented, should feel invisible. It should just make good work easier. My goal is to build systems that are both powerful and practical, where innovation translates directly into results that drive revenue generation.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

Dad to 2 daughters #breakthebias | Former record shop owner | Entrepreneur | Caffeine-fueled | Vegan foodie | There is no Planet B
headline: GTM Ops Technology & Innovation | AI Champion

educations.schoolName: BCS, The Chartered Institute for IT

position.title: Senior Manager, Sales Operations - Technology and Innovation

multiLocaleTitle.en_US: Senior Manager, Sales Operations - Technology and Innovation

position.description:
I own the strategic oversight and optimisation of the sales and marketing technology stack, driving measurable efficiency gains through intelligent automation and AI implementation. Acting as the liaison between Sales, GTM Operations, and IT, I ensure our technology ecosystem maximises revenue generation.

Sales Technology & Optimisation
• Manage the end-to-end technical stack including sales engagement and data platforms
• Optimise role-specific toolsets for BDRs, AEs, and Leadership to reduce administrative burden and increase selling time
• Oversee vendor evaluation, selection, and negotiation whilst conducting regular audits to ensure ROI and eliminate redundancy
• Establish and enforce governance policies for CRM data standards and tool usage.

AI, Automation & Innovation
• Identify, pilot, and implement AI and machine learning solutions to automate repetitive tasks and improve forecast accuracy
• Design complex cross-platform workflows between CRM and sales engagement tools to enforce best practices and maintain data quality
• Develop formal testing processes for new technologies, measuring impact on close rates, sales cycle length, and quota attainment.

Process Design & Cross-Functional Leadership
• Design and iterate the lead-to-opportunity process, optimising handoffs between Marketing, Business Development, and Sales
• Partner with Field Sales Ops, Marketing Ops, and Sales Leadership to standardise processes and ensure organisational alignment
• Collaborate with Sales Enablement to develop operational documentation and training materials for all sales tools and processes​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

position.title: Senior Manager, Head of International Sales Development

multiLocaleTitle.en_US: Senior Manager, Head of International Sales Development

position.description:
Lead and coach a team of 8 BDRs across EMEA & APAC, consistently adapting to changing market environments and scaling growth through prospect awareness, education and prioritisation.

Key achievements:
• Designed AE–BDR alignment model that improved territory coverage and pipeline velocity.
• Partnered with MOps and SOps to refine reporting dashboards, campaign procedure and automate account coverage tracking.
• Piloted AI-driven account research workflow, reducing prospecting admin by the equivalent of a working week across the team.
• Coached BDRs on outbound methodology, building scalable playbooks that improved meeting quality and pipeline consistency.

position.title: Manager, Sales Development (International)
position.description:
I lead a rockstar team of 8 BDRs based in multiple locations across EMEA and APAC.

We don't just have an awesome suite of leading products on the number one cloud business platform, Certinia is an epic place to work. Why not check out our careers page to see if your ideal role is listed now.

position.title: BDR Manager, EMEA
position.description:
Certinia is the platform for services business. 

Empower all of your revenue functions to make real-time decisions, planning and forecasts from one source of truth on the Salesforce platform.

position.title: SDR Manager
position.description:
Built and scaled the SDR team from scratch, combining coaching with system design to establish a predictable outbound engine.

Key achievements:
• Designed SDR workflows and reporting processes in CRM, creating clear visibility of pipeline drivers.
• Introduced automation and prospecting tools that improved outbound efficiency and lead response times.
• Developed playbooks and training that improved SDR ramp time and qualification quality.
• Collaborated with leadership to align SDR activity with founder-level GTM strategy from SaaS Academy.
• Positioned SDR team as primary revenue driver, generating majority of new business opportunities through a combination of high-touch outbound and automated outreach.

position.title: SDR
position.description:
Launched SDR function during early-stage growth phase, combining technical sales training with hands-on outbound execution.

Key achievements:
• Completed IT & Technical Sales L3 qualification (Distinction), applying technical frameworks to prospecting.
• Implemented structured outbound processes focused on ICP high-growth SaaS, targeting C-Suite, product and technical decision-makers.
• Built first version of SDR data tracking and reporting, providing leadership with visibility of opportunity sources.
• Helped lay foundation for SDR function to become primary contributor to pipeline through outbound channels.

position.title: Recruitment Consultant
position.description:
Focused on placing marketing professionals into leading UK law firms. Balanced candidate placement with proactive business development, leveraging outbound prospecting and networking to build new client relationships.

Key achievements:
• Secured new client accounts through outbound outreach, networking events, and relationship building.
• Developed a strong understanding of professional services firms’ hiring needs, particularly within legal marketing.
• Delivered full recruitment lifecycle support, from sourcing and interviewing to negotiating offers.
• Built lasting partnerships with both clients and candidates by providing tailored career and hiring advice.

position.title: Co-Founder / Director
position.description:
Co-founded and operated a profitable retail + eCommerce business, combining music, specialty coffee, and events. Managed full business lifecycle from setup to growth, developing transferable skills in systems, operations, and customer experience.

Key achievements:
• Built and redesigned eCommerce site independently, integrating payments, inventory, and CRM for online sales.
• Negotiated and managed supplier relationships with distributors, creating sustainable supply chain processes.
• Developed digital marketing and customer loyalty programmes that drove recurring revenue streams.
• Managed licensing, compliance, and financial planning, ensuring operational continuity and profitability.
• Scaled community engagement through in-store events and partnerships, driving brand visibility and customer retention.

position.title: Marketing Executive
position.description:
Delivered marketing, events, and digital campaigns to promote premium automotive brands BMW and MINI. Blended traditional and digital marketing with community-focused initiatives to drive engagement and brand awareness.

Key achievements:
• Managed end-to-end events including product launches and showroom promotions, increasing local engagement and test drive bookings.
• Created and executed targeted email and social media campaigns, improving lead generation and customer retention.
• Initiated sustainability-focused partnership with an eco eCommerce brand, launching a joint market stall in Hertford to promote the BMW i3 electric vehicle and sustainable products.
• Developed content and campaigns that positioned the dealership as forward-thinking and environmentally conscious, aligning with the rise of EV adoption.
• Gained early experience in campaign analytics, measuring engagement and conversion from digital and in-person channels.

position.title: Recruitment Consultant
position.description:
Specialised in placing professional support staff into top UK and US law firms. Managed full-cycle recruitment while driving new business development through targeted outbound prospecting.

Key achievements:
• Built and maintained resourcing agreements with leading law firms, creating sustainable revenue streams.
• Executed outbound campaigns to engage decision-makers (HR Directors, Operational Leaders) across UK and US firms.
• Negotiated fees, balancing client requirements, winning profitable bids.
• Grew candidate network through proactive sourcing, cold outreach, and relationship management.
• Delivered consistent placements in a highly competitive legal recruitment market.

position.title: Trainee Recruitment Consultant
position.description:
Gained foundational experience in candidate sourcing, research, and market mapping to support senior consultants. Developed outbound outreach skills that translated into future business development success.

Key achievements:
• Conducted structured research to build candidate pools for niche legal support roles.
• Learned and applied outbound phone, email, and LinkedIn prospecting techniques.
• Supported senior consultants in managing client accounts, preparing shortlists, and coordinating interviews.
• Developed early commercial acumen in competitive professional services recruitment.

multiLocaleSummary.en:
I lead the strategic oversight and optimisation of sales and marketing technology ecosystems at Certinia. My focus is operationalising go-to-market systems that combine data, process, and people to scale revenue impact.

I manage complex technical stacks from end to end, optimising workflows for every sales role to eliminate administrative friction. I’m particularly passionate about AI and automation, identifying and implementing machine learning solutions that automate repetitive tasks, improve forecast accuracy, and create tangible business impact through cross-platform workflows.

I refine reporting, improve opportunity conversion rates and territory coverage, and implement automation that maximises coverage and efficiency, with hands-on experience in Salesforce-native workflows, Outreach, 6sense, and AI-assisted prospecting.

I design and refine lead-to-opportunity processes whilst standardising workflows across Field Sales Ops, Marketing Ops, and Sales Leadership to ensure organisational alignment.

I believe the right technology, properly implemented, should feel invisible. It should just make good work easier. My goal is to build systems that are both powerful and practical, where innovation translates directly into results that drive revenue generation.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
